price: 108. To boye, bolingi kotuna motindami na bino ndenge moko Mûssa atunamaka liboso? Mpe moto oyo akobalola kondima na bopengwi ya sôló ye wana asili kobunga nzela.
arabic: أَمۡ تُرِيدُونَ أَن تَسۡـَٔلُواْ رَسُولَكُمۡ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۗ وَمَن يَتَبَدَّلِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am turīdūna an tasalū rasūlakum kamā su-ila mūsā min qablu waman yatabaddali al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni faqad ḍalla sawāa al-sabīli
